headline: Does Republic Services Offer Real Value After Recent Recycling Expansion?
summary: Wondering whether Republic Services is truly a good deal right now? If you have ever asked yourself if the market price reflects the company’s real worth, you are in the right place. The stock has seen a 2.5% lift in the last week but is down 3.6% over the past month. Its year-to-date gain sits at 7.5%, and it is only slightly below water for the past year at -0.2%. Republic Services recently caught attention for its commitment to expanding recycling capacity and investing in sustainable...
